mapper.select: select * from champListT order by champion_name_kr asc;

select champion_name_kr, champion_name from champListT where champion_name_kr like concat('%',#{searchChamp},'%') or champion_name like concat('%',#{searchChamp},'%') or champion_name_cons like concat('%',#{searchChamp},'%') order by champion_name_kr asc;
select champion_name_kr, champion_name from champListT where line like concat('%',#{line},'%') order by champion_name_kr asc;
select champion_name_kr,champion_name from champListT order by champion_name_kr asc;
select champion_name,champion_name_kr from champListT order by champion_name_kr asc;
